dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
GPTune is an autotuning framework that relies on multitask and transfer
learnings to help solve the underlying black-box optimization problem
using Bayesian optimization methodologies.
dependent_to.name: gptune

dependent_to.description:
hipBLASLt is a library that provides general matrix-matrix operations
with a flexible API and extends functionalities beyond a traditional
BLAS library
dependent_to.name: hipblaslt

dependent_to.description:
hipSPARSELt is a SPARSE marshalling library, with multiple supported
backends. It sits between the application and a 'worker' SPARSE library,
marshalling inputs into the backend library and marshalling results back
to the application. hipSPARSELt exports an interface that does not
require the client to change, regardless of the chosen backend.
Currently, hipSPARSELt supports rocSPARSELt and cuSPARSELt v0.4 as
backends.
dependent_to.name: hipsparselt

dependent_to.description:
CellProfiler cell image analysis software. CellProfiler is a free open-
source software designed to enable biologists without training in
computer vision or programming to quantitatively measure phenotypes from
thousands of images automatically.
dependent_to.name: py-cellprofiler

dependent_to.description: Context geo-tiles in Python.
dependent_to.name: py-contextily

dependent_to.description:
This toolkit contains tools to extract conversational features and
analyze social phenomena in conversations, using a single unified
interface inspired by (and compatible with) scikit-learn.
dependent_to.name: py-convokit

dependent_to.description:
cuML is a suite of libraries that implement machine learning algorithms
and mathematical primitives functions that share compatible APIs with
other RAPIDS projects.
dependent_to.name: py-cuml

dependent_to.description:
deep-significance: Easy and Better Significance Testing for Deep Neural
Networks
dependent_to.name: py-deepsig

dependent_to.description:
A Modified version of scikit-optimize a Sequential model-based
optimization toolbox for DeepHyper. Scikit-Optimize, or skopt, is a
simple and efficient library to minimize (very) expensive and noisy
black-box functions. It implements several methods for sequential model-
based optimization. skopt aims to be accessible and easy to use in many
contexts. The library is built on top of NumPy, SciPy and Scikit-Learn.
dependent_to.name: py-dh-scikit-optimize

dependent_to.description:
Earth-2 Model Intercomparison Project (MIP). A python framework that
enables climate researchers and scientists to explore and experiment
with AI models for weather and climate.
dependent_to.name: py-earth2mip

dependent_to.description:
fitter package provides a simple class to identify the distribution from
which a data samples is generated from. It uses 80 distributions from
Scipy and allows you to plot the results to check what is the most
probable distribution and the best parameters.
dependent_to.name: py-fitter

dependent_to.description:
This is a Python wrapper for the fortran library used in the R package
glmnet.
dependent_to.name: py-glmnet

dependent_to.description:
This is a python version of the popular glmnet library (beta release).
Glmnet fits the entire lasso or elastic-net regularization path for
linear regression, logistic and multinomial regression models, poisson
regression and the cox model.
dependent_to.name: py-glmnet-python

dependent_to.description: A toolbox for accurate single-trial estimates in fMRI time-series data.
dependent_to.name: py-glmsingle

dependent_to.description:
HDBSCAN - Hierarchical Density-Based Spatial Clustering of Applications
with Noise. Performs DBSCAN over varying epsilon values and integrates
the result to find a clustering that gives the best stability over
epsilon. This allows HDBSCAN to find clusters of varying densities
(unlike DBSCAN), and be more robust to parameter selection. In practice
this means that HDBSCAN returns a good clustering straight away with
little or no parameter tuning -- and the primary parameter, minimum
cluster size, is intuitive and easy to select. HDBSCAN is ideal for
exploratory data analysis; it's a fast and robust algorithm that you can
trust to return meaningful clusters (if there are any).
dependent_to.name: py-hdbscan

dependent_to.description: Composable histogram primitives for distributed data reduction.
dependent_to.name: py-histogrammar

dependent_to.description:
imbalanced-learn is a python package offering a number of re-sampling
techniques commonly used in datasets showing strong between-class
imbalance. It is compatible with scikit-learn and is part of scikit-
learn-contrib projects.
dependent_to.name: py-imbalanced-learn

dependent_to.description:
Python implementations of the k-modes and k-prototypes clustering
algorithms for clustering categorical data.
dependent_to.name: py-kmodes

dependent_to.description: A python package for music and audio analysis.
dependent_to.name: py-librosa

dependent_to.description:
MDAnalysis is a Python toolkit to analyze molecular dynamics
trajectories generated by a wide range of popular simulation packages
including DL_Poly, CHARMM, Amber, NAMD, LAMMPS, and Gromacs. (See the
lists of supported trajectory formats and topology formats.)
dependent_to.name: py-mdanalysis

dependent_to.description: MNE python project for MEG and EEG data analysis.
dependent_to.name: py-mne

dependent_to.description: Reusable tools for working with next-generation sequencing (NGS) data.
dependent_to.name: py-ngs-tools

dependent_to.description: Statistical learning for neuroimaging in Python.
dependent_to.name: py-nilearn

dependent_to.description:
The Natural Language Toolkit (NLTK) is a Python package for natural
language processing.
dependent_to.name: py-nltk

dependent_to.description: A Bacterial Pangenome Analysis Pipeline
dependent_to.name: py-panaroo

dependent_to.description:
PICRUSt2 is a software for predicting functional abundances based only
on marker gene sequences.
dependent_to.name: py-picrust2

dependent_to.description: Fast, flexible and easy to use probabilistic modelling in Python.
dependent_to.name: py-pomegranate

dependent_to.description:
PyNNDescent is a Python nearest neighbor descent for approximate nearest
neighbors.
dependent_to.name: py-pynndescent

dependent_to.description:
pyts is a Python package for time series classification. It aims to make
time series classification easily accessible by providing preprocessing
and utility tools, and implementations of state-of-the-art algorithms.
Most of these algorithms transform time series, thus pyts provides
several tools to perform these transformations.
dependent_to.name: py-pyts

dependent_to.description: Quality Assessment Tool for Genome Assemblies
dependent_to.name: py-quast

dependent_to.description: Representational Similarity Analysis (RSA) in Python.
dependent_to.name: py-rsatoolbox

dependent_to.description: LGPL MosesTokenizer in Python.
dependent_to.name: py-sacremoses

dependent_to.description:
Scanpy is a scalable toolkit for analyzing single-cell gene expression
data built jointly with anndata.
dependent_to.name: py-scanpy

dependent_to.description: A set of python modules for machine learning and data mining.
dependent_to.name: py-scikit-learn

dependent_to.description:
Scikit-Optimize, or skopt, is a simple and efficient library to minimize
(very) expensive and noisy black-box functions. It implements several
methods for sequential model-based optimization. skopt aims to be
accessible and easy to use in many contexts. The library is built on top
of NumPy, SciPy and Scikit-Learn.
dependent_to.name: py-scikit-optimize

dependent_to.description:
SMAC is a tool for algorithm configuration to optimize the parameters of
arbitrary algorithms, including hyperparameter optimization of Machine
Learning algorithms.
dependent_to.name: py-smac

dependent_to.description:
Variants of the synthetic minority oversampling technique (SMOTE) for
imbalanced learning
dependent_to.name: py-smote-variants

dependent_to.description:
A Python Automated Machine Learning tool that optimizes machine
learning pipelines using genetic programming.
dependent_to.name: py-tpot

dependent_to.description:
Ytopt package implements search using Random Forest (SuRF), an
autotuning search method developed within Y-Tune ECP project.
dependent_to.name: py-ytopt

dependent_to.description:
Quality assessment of de novo transcriptome assemblies from RNA-Seq data
rnaQUAST is a tool for evaluating RNA-Seq assemblies using reference
genome and gene database. In addition, rnaQUAST is also capable of
estimating gene database coverage by raw reads and de novo quality
assessment using third-party software.
dependent_to.name: rnaquast

dependent_to.description: Radeon Open Compute BLAS library
dependent_to.name: rocblas

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
